ygData.subject: RE: Tallon Zek Proposal
ygData.msgSnippet: I m neutral to the shifting, I just follow the majority kakis s decision, even thou my wiz is just half bubb to lvl 24 (shld have lvl if not becoz of server
ygData.messageBody:
I'm neutral to the shifting, I just follow the majority kakis's decision,
even thou my wiz is just half bubb to lvl 24 (shld have lvl if not becoz of
server down last night).

Personally I think TZ server will be a very difficult server yet filled
with roleplay elements. Ever since we play EQ for so long, I bet by now
most of us know what we wanna be, how to train what our char and possess
with, at least, the basic survival knowledge. Compared to the time when I
start EQ w/o been a beta player, I was wrong at that time when making
certain decisions, particularly how my char is created.

Nevertheless, I will stick to Wiz even if we were to shift over to the new
server. Life is gonna be tough (esp the the begining stage, like wanna die
cannot die, wanna live cannot live) but if it's a race war server, that
mean we better select to be under the same team. With the same team, I bet
it will be much easier for us to hunt together.

I'm for Erudite Wiz - with max INT pump in. Life will be harder than a HE
since ER dun have infravision (tried once in Prexus making a ER Wiz and
find it VERY difficult to play w/o light, kena whack up-down-left-right
shortly after I walked out of city).

I leave the decision to the majority and my heart follow the majority. Just
make sure this is the LAST migration, IF we have decided to shift.

Btw, can someone enllighten me on the following:
In normal server, npc only KOS char of different alignment (eg DE kena KOS
in all elfs settlements, human kena KOS in Troll/Ogre territory, BUT human
wont be KOS in elf terrority). May I know if a char of good race walk into
the city of ANOTHER TEAM which is ALSO a good race, will the char kena KOS?
Eg HE and Human are considered good races yet under different team, will a
human who walk into Felwithe kena KOS by HE npcs?
- If the answer is yes, then evil races will be a good choice, since based
on EQ'Lizer's article abt race war team comparison, evil races (DE, troll,
Ogre) have some of the best races for most of the classes. They also have
advantages since they have more access to the better lvling dungeons.
- If the answer is no (ie human char can go to elf shop buying supplies w/o
been KOS), I will go for human, erudite and barbarian, they can lvl
fastest. Thou life is hard in the begining w/o light, but the reward will
pay off at the later stage. Erudite makes the most powerful casters at
high lvl, Barbarian make excellent tankers and human is the most flexible
amg all races, plus no xp penalty - see how someone in Inno lvl so damn
fast? hehe.

Ziltus



On Tuesday, 27 July, 1999 9:25 PM, Entreri [SMTP:drizzt@...]
wrote:
> Hi guys,
> I propose that we all move to Tallon Zek[PvP Teams].Okay here are my
SUGGESTIONS on why we MIGHT wanna move there.However if there isnt much
support,I will stay in Innoruuk with u guys.All critisims are welcomed!
>
> 1.Guild:Okay,lets face it,for normal servers,Guild aint of much fan
except of a tag there.I foresee that if a guild is set up in Tallon Zek,it
would be much more meaningfull in the sense that when everyone has a common
goal and at the same time roleplaying WHAT it should be[huh?A paladin and
SK chatting with each other?].Serious roleplaying could be carried to the
fullest and the tension when going over zones which WILL encourage grouping
>
> 2.New Server.Since its new,it would be nice that there will be players
around to group.
>
> 3.MAIN POINT:The tension!This time,you would be much more carefull going
through zones and when buddies come the fullest and where racism too
:).Although all the Singaporean EQ Players would be best if same
group,however we could have some not in this group so they could set up
their own guild and wage war with us which WILL defintely improve the SG EQ
community.If we could not be friends,we could be still foes :)
>
> 4.ok..high level players..ahem Garren...There seems to be a quest to
switch servers though I do not encourage this coz it would be more fun if
everyone same level.
>
> 5.SG Mauling:heh..Imagine all 35SG players on this list play same group
and have a FULLSCALE invasion on Freeport?hehe...imagine the fun..
>
> 6.The spirit bond BTW on SG players will defintely tighten with this..:)
>
> 7.Makes higher lv SGs get good items for their lower SG counterparts so
our SG strength could be increased.[Note:Coz 300levels4s could maul a
level50?]
>
> 8.We could have serious planning on what class to use so we would not be
as messy as now...
>
> 9.We had PROBABLY wrongly configured our chr in the past so it would be a
nice change
>
> 10.SGs players are now split into 2..mainly the highlevels and low
levels..It would be nice if this everyone would be same level again
>
> Thx for reading...just my 2cents
>
>
>
